MemoryInfobox.location: Triple Peninsula of Chalkidike, Makedonia, Greece

General_Description: '''Rumored Conch Shell Location''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: One of the maps given by [[Xenia]] for [[Triton]]'s Conch Shell leads here.
Section_Dialogue:
Kassandra finally arrives to the correct rumored location at the [[Underwater Cavern]].
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Hmm. The entrance must be underwater.''
She dove and dealt with a shark swimming around the entrance, then swam through it. She swam through a long, winding tunnel lighted only by bioluminescent jellyfishes, then surfaces to a small chamber before continuing to the next submerged, and twisting tunnel. Kassandra finally arrives to the main cave and kills all the bandits before looting the chest in the middle.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''So, this is the conch? It's heavy. I can see why Xenia wants it.''
After examining the conch, Kassandra looks around.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I'd rather not swim through that tunnel again. There's a breeze in here. Must be another way out.''
She saw the ladders going up to the surface entrance of the cavern and climbed it.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''

Structured_Dialogue.content: Kassandra finally arrives to the correct rumored location at the [[Underwater Cavern]].

She dove and dealt with a shark swimming around the entrance, then swam through it. She swam through a long, winding tunnel lighted only by bioluminescent jellyfishes, then surfaces to a small chamber before continuing to the next submerged, and twisting tunnel. Kassandra finally arrives to the main cave and kills all the bandits before looting the chest in the middle.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''So, this is the conch? It's heavy. I can see why Xenia wants it.''
After examining the conch, Kassandra looks around.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I'd rather not swim through that tunnel again. There's a breeze in here. Must be another way out.''
She saw the ladders going up to the surface entrance of the cavern and climbed it.
